issue.title: [Java] delete() method via JNI for plasma
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3607](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3607). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently delete(objectId) method has not been exposed via JNI interface.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3607?focusedCommentId=16697559) by Robert Nishihara (robertnishihara):*
